name: Upgrades
description: These are upgrades that can be applied to most things with the "Technology" trait.

equipment.name: Artifical Intelligence
equipment.body: Artifical Intelligence upgrades allow a device to be communicated with and controlled using one's voice or telepathy, as well as supply the device with a variety of complex functions such as routine procedures that control normally out-of-bounds applications and connected devices. Having this upgrade increases any DC made to hack the device by 2.
